summary: Comprehensive Spanish translation testing for Bible Lesson Planner app. Tested language switching, Settings page, Offline Settings, Help Chatbot, and Templates page in Spanish. Most translations are working correctly, but found several hardcoded English text items in the Templates page that need to be updated to use the t() translation function.

design_issues.issue: Category filter buttons use hardcoded English names instead of t() function
Age group filter buttons use hardcoded English names instead of t() function
'Age Group' section header is hardcoded English (line 976)
Some nav items remain in English: 'My Lessons', 'Tutorials', 'Contact Us'
Hero title 'Bible Study & Sunday School Lessons' and 'Rooted in Scripture' did not translate to Spanish

action_items: Update templates.tsx CATEGORIES array to use translation keys or lookup t() function
Update templates.tsx AGE_GROUPS array to use translation keys
Replace hardcoded 'Age Group' with t('templates.ageGroup') or similar
Check authenticated navbar to ensure all nav items use t() for translation
Verify homepage hero title translations are being applied correctly
critical_code_review_comments: templates.tsx uses hardcoded category/age group names in static arrays - these need to be converted to use translation keys like 'templates.allTemplates', 'templates.preschool', etc.
The Spanish translations exist in i18n.tsx for all templates page elements - they just aren't being used in the component
Consider refactoring CATEGORIES and AGE_GROUPS to use translation key IDs that map to i18n translations

success_rate.frontend: 80% - Core translations working, Templates page has hardcoded text issues
